step.framework.extensions
Class WebServiceInterceptorParameter

java.lang.Object
  step.framework.extensions.InterceptorParameter
      step.framework.extensions.WebServiceInterceptorParameter

public class WebServiceInterceptorParameter
extends InterceptorParameter

An instance of this class is provided as parameter to each web service interceptor and enables it to access configuration and context data.
